title: Virus lockdown spawns at-home amateur barbers
description: The coronavirus pandemic forcing the shutdown of nonessential businesses has created a small but growing problem for Americans - with no hair salons or barber shops open, people have to turn to other methods of getting their hair cut and colored. Ed O’Keefe s…
